The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. "You know, I love Eminem but... Just 15 days after the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001, President Bush invited his defense secretary, Donald Rumsfeld Barack Obama Donald Rumsfeld , to meet with him alone in the Oval Office. According to Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's new memoir, the president leaned back in his leather chair and ordered a review and revision of war plans- but not for Afghanistan, where the Qaeda attacks on New York and Washington had been planned and where American retaliation was imminent.
